name: Sweet nightmares (BDP07)
description:
hey! sweet nightmares is a endless game where you're a kid, that needs to survive your nightmares, it was made for a gamejam so it's really simple, doesn't have any sounds, just the basic gameplay.

CONTROLS:

WASD = movement

TIPS:

you have only one life, so avoid all enemies;

if an enemy hits another enemy both die, so use this as a weapon.

that's it hope that everyone enjoys it!

PS: this is my first real game that is being out for public, so pls don't expect much,
